name: Cooking Marina - Cooking games
description:
Welcome to Cooking Marina - new cooking restaurant games 2020. The Grand Marina Cruise has arrived in town. Let's enjoy your holiday with Cooking Marina and become the Master Chef of the World. As you know, Singapore is well-known as one of the most beautiful and fresh cities in the world and especially Singapore is also famous for a diverse cuisine paradise.
This fast restaurant cooking game will take you to travel around Singapore and some countries in Asia to experience tasty dishes with unique cooking recipes.

HOW TO PLAY
Touch the screen to prepare, cook & serve correctly.
Choose available ingredients to cook according to the customer's orders
Don't forget to upgrade your ingredients and kitchen items to speed up cooking
Collect coins and gems as much as possible and try to get 3 stars on each level.
Use more boosts to pass 500+ levels more easily.
Serve more customers and create more combos
Finish small tasks in the achievements box
Do not burn or waste any food! With this super fast cooking game, be careful with cooking speed & time during rush hour.

SUPER CHEF COOKING GAMES FEATURE:
Free to download and play chef cooking restaurant offline or online.
Open food cities to start an amazing cooking adventure
Unlock your new restaurants & upgrade the fast kitchen to speed up cooking.
Discover unique cooking recipes in Singapore & countries in Asia: Boil, Grill, Bake, Fry,...
Cook & Serve 100+ yummy dishes to your cute customers
Time management cooking game with controlling your cooking speed and time are so important
More fun with power boosts to pass high level cooking games for girls & boys. Try now!
Enjoy beautiful graphics & lively sound effects.

Come to a new fast food cooking game in Cooking Marina, start cuisine adventure around Singapore & countries in Asia. Your mission in this chef restaurant cooking games is cooking & serving cute customers and make them feel happy with your best cooking skills: seafood restaurant, sweet restaurant, coffee shop,... Simulate cooking time management games, you need control time & speed in each level because it will be very fast paced cooking games.

Start now! Discover cuisine paradise in Singapore and countries in Asia only at chef cooking games for girls & boys & fans of speed cooking games.Welcome to Cooking Marina - new cooking restaurant games 2019. This fast restaurant cooking game will take you to travel around Singapore and some countries in Asia to experience tasty dishes with unique cooking recipes.
